entry.title: Come As You Are
entry.summary:
Author: everyonethinkstoomuch

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,712Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 64

Summary: 'Bruce was only watching to see how Clark’s sparring was coming along... He wasn’t watching Clark because he liked him or found him attractive. That would be foolish, and not sensible at all, and a distraction from the more important things in life, like beating up criminals every night and passing his exams.'When Clark Kent gets into yet another fight on a night out, his friend Diana suggests he joins the university boxing club to get used to fighting back, without killing someone with his superpowers. Bruce Wayne has just transferred to Metropolis City University and isn’t all too happy about it. Unlike everyone else he knows, he misses Gotham. And now he has to balance university, being Batman, and his feelings for Clark Kent - which he definitely doesn’t have.CONTENT WARNINGS: a little bit of swearing, implied abuse, implied & described mild violence, lots of discussion of dead parents.This is an AU drawing on several different versions of characters and also my own interpretation of them. Bruce is Battinson, Clark is Corensupes & Smallville. The others are a mix of all media types and kind of just what I want them to be!

entry.title: What is a Bat if not for his Two Wings?
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,482Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 312

Summary: Bruce Wayne had spent years perfecting the art of being underestimated. The impulsive, table-dancing, ice-sculptor-grinding, billion-dollar himbo persona kept people from looking too closely — especially at Gotham’s other nocturnal resident.But with the Justice League newly formed, curiosity was brewing, and one caped Kryptonian in particular was determined to uncover the man behind the Bat. Clark Kent, investigative journalist and alien protector, was convinced Bruce Wayne’s friendship with Batman meant something more — maybe funding, maybe shared secrets. The problem? Bruce knew Clark’s game, and he was going to play it better. When a gala-turned-villain-attack forced Bruce to act in his Wayne persona and Superman swooped in to save him, the lines between charm and suspicion blurred. Bruce, ever the flirt, ran his hand over Superman’s bicep with a grin and purred, “You saved my life just for a question?”It was going to take more than x-ray vision to win this bet.When a simple bet turns to much more than two players hoped.

entry.title: Lavender Marriage
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,967Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 343

Summary: Lex Luthor has sponsored the new wing of the Metropolis Science Museum, and Clark and Bruce both suspect foul play. While in the geology exhibit, they discover an unknown strand of kryptonite, which cripples Clark almost immediately. Bruce drags him away, but just as they're catching their breath, a mysterious gunman fires on Clark from the shadows, piercing his heart with a bullet, specially made from Luthor's new find.Bruce gets Clark to a safe house and manages to extract the bullet, but not before saving Clark from its strange effects. When he wakes up, Clark recognizes Bruce. But not as his caped companion, or a fellow member of the League. They aren't competitors, allies, or even just friends.According to Clark, Bruce Wayne is his husband.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,838Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 25

Summary: There were rumours all over Gotham of the ‘prince’ crashing out. There were pictures of Bruce Wayne in the news in which he was waving away the paparazzi as he walked out of a drug store carrying an armful of painkillers at three in the morning; wandering around in Crime Alley with a dime bag and a half-empty bottle of whiskey more expensive than most people could even dream about—and that same image came up in the news next to one of him in a gurney, bruises all over his face and body, unconscious. Some people thought it was understandable, considering one of his adopted kids had just gone missing. Others thought it was a disgrace for a man to be acting like this when the police were doing everything in their power to bring the kid back... Everything in the world is about sex, except sex. Sex is about power. After Jason died, Bruce was a wreck. He went off the deep end, succumbing to vices he'd never touched before. He lost himself in decisions he hoped he could leave in his past, but years later he discovers he's wrong in the most dangerous way. It doesn't help that one experimental night changes his entire perception of himself.

entry.title: Nightwing: Resurrection
entry.summary:
Author: bats1gnals

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,568Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 16

Summary: The world ends via one last and fatal doomsday scenario. However, instead of dying along with it, Dick Grayson finds himself in a new universe. In a world similar yet different from his own, Dick struggles to understand why only he was given a second chance when everyone else he knew died. Retaining all of his memories but now 8 years old, Dick strives to find a balance between understanding his newfound and bizarre situation while also enjoying precious time with family.

entry.title: A System of Eagles and The Shadow of Devils
entry.summary:
Author: Winkaku

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,717Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 162

Summary: For eons uncounted the world of Apokolipse stood strong, vile and cruel, uncontested. For time untold Darkseid stood alone at the apex of Hell itself. Setting his eyes upon the shadow of the Bat, he would have the prize for himself and none would stop him. The New God of Apokolipse would have his Devil at his side, the left hand of a god, The Justice League and all their cloying be damned. As for Superman the road not traveled is fading fast, it's now or never, no matter the strictures of command and the trauma that dictated the chasm between them. No more running, no more hiding, no more pushing each other away, as now they may be pulled apart forever beneath the wings of eagles.Please feel free to leave reviews, it's like Christmas morning seeing all the presents when I get them.Book one of four.There are eleven chapters total, several other chapters being devoted to associated artworks made in conjunction with the series.

entry.title: 𝑪𝑳𝑶𝑺𝑬 𝑸𝑼𝑨𝑹𝑻𝑬𝑹𝑺 // 𝑨 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑩𝑨𝑻 𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑹𝒀
entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,014Chapters: 21/26Kudos: 437

Summary: Bruce Wayne is no stranger to the spotlight—or the shadows it casts. Reclusive, haunted by tragedy, and heir to a name that carries more weight than comfort, he now faces something far more personal than public scrutiny: a stalker. The letters arrive like clockwork—taunting, obsessive, familiar. And with Halloween approaching—the anniversary of his parents' death—the tension coils tighter.Clark Kent is a disciplined, quietly intense MMA-trained security specialist, brought in under General Sam Lane’s orders to keep Bruce safe. He expects a job. He doesn’t expect the gothic cold of Wayne Manor, the brooding silence of its only resident, or the unsettling depth of what Bruce refuses to say out loud.But as danger creeps closer, and the mystery surrounding the stalker sharpens, Bruce and Clark are forced into uncomfortable proximity. What begins as resistance slowly becomes something deeper—something fragile and real.
